nodes.text: Razik was a male Sith Lord who served the resurgent Empire during the Cold War and the Galactic War. A pale-skinned Human with red-orange eyes and short black hair in a double stripe hairstyle, Razik made use of a double-bladed lightsaber and armored robes in combat. When the Galactic Republic joined the Balmorran resistance in their attempt to drive the Empire off the planet Balmorra in 3642 BBY, Razik was stationed in the Balmorran Arms Factory during the battle to protect a cloaking device prototype.

However, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython and the medic Doc raided the factory to recover the device. When the pair copied research data from a terminal and set off an alarm, Razik and his soldiers entered the room and attacked the two in an unsuccessful attempt to stop the Hero from reaching the device, resulting in the Imperials' deaths.

Lord Razik's only appearance is in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts on December 20, 2011. He appears in the Jedi Knight mission "Spoils of War" on Balmorra, where he attempts to stop the player and Doc from reaching the cloaking device.
